root: ^My wife wants to go out to dinner but I wanted to watch a hockey game.
^Go out to dinner and record the game to watch later
^Tell her I want to stay home and watch the game and order food to be delivered
^Make dinner for the two of you and watch the game during dinner
^Go out to dinner early so that I can come back and see the end of the game

res1: ^The dinner is expensive but my wife and I have a great time, however, someone at the restaurant ruins the game for me and I end up getting in a fight.
^Well, the night went well with my wife and I was looking forward to watching the game at home until someone ruined it and I got carried away and got into a fight. That was kind of dumb of me.
res2: ^My wife gets annoyed with me but I get to watch the entire game. Also, I saved money on cheap delivery.
^I definitely saved money by ordering cheap delivery and I had a great time watching the game... but I realized by the end of the game how agitated my wife was. Whoops!
res3: ^My wife loves the idea and enjoys watching the game with me. However, I burn myself badly when cooking dinner.
^My wife actually loved the idea of eating together and watching the game since I put in the effort to make us dinner. Dinner was delicious, but I burned myself really badly on the stove!
res4: ^My wife is happy with me and we have a great time. The dinner is expensive but I get back in time to see the end of the game.
^All in all, I’m glad I made this decision. The game only got interesting at the end anyway and I saw the whole last bit, plus my wife and I had a great night.
